value.title: New Applied Materials Tools Use AI to Catch Mistakes on Chips
value.excerpt: A new semiconductor manufacturing technology from Applied Materials uses artificial intelligence, or AI, to spot mistakes in chips more effectively, the U.S. company said on Tuesday. Modern chip manufacturing happens in factories that cost upward of $18 billion each to build and requires hundreds of separate steps.

value.title: This Chip for AI Works Using Light, Not Electrons
